footer.description: Proudly developed by the Ma'ayan Lab at Mount Sinai, leveraging our expertise in data management and cloud solutions. This project is generously funded by the Alexandra and Steven Cohen Foundation, whose support has been instrumental in bringing this innovative platform to life.

startpage.title: dataXways
startpage.subtitle: Welcome to DataXways—your ultimate solution for seamless data management in the cloud. Our platform empowers you to efficiently handle massive datasets with ease and precision. By leveraging advanced regulatory controls, DataXways ensures that only authorized users have access to sensitive information, optimizing both security and accessibility. Visualize and organize your data effortlessly with our intuitive dashboard, which offers a comprehensive view into your data's structure, status, and accessibility. Whether you're managing databases, file systems, or streaming data, DataXways provides the tools you need to maintain control and clarity in a complex data-driven world. Elevate your data management experience with DataXways—where your data flows more efficiently and securely than ever before.
startpage.about: Access data directly through the data portal or programmatically using the API.

contacts.bio: A connoisseur of all things temporary, Billie enjoys experimenting with the latest in digital mockup technology..
With an eye for detail, Sally brings the concept of placeholder text to life in every project she touches.
Ima specializes in being everywhere and nowhere at once, seamlessly blending into any prototype.

collections_highlight.title: dataXways supports the inclusion of diverse data types. Data is organized in collections which behave similar to folders.

request_data.instructions: To request data access, please contact the admin by email. We will then work with you to provide all the required permissions, if appropriate. Remember to declare which collections do you need access.
